title:
Philips Sonicare 4100 Power Toothbrush, Rechargeable Electric Toothbrush with Pressure Sensor, Black HX3681/24, removes up to 3x more plaque vs. a manual toothbrush, signals when your 2 minutes is up,
pressure sensor to prevent gun recession, includes 1 electric toothbrush, 1 SymplyClean brush head, 1 USB charger (without wall adaptor),
descriptions:
Philips Sonicare 4100 Power Toothbrush (Model HX3681/24) – Black

Experience a deeper clean with the Philips Sonicare 4100, engineered to remove up to 3x more plaque than a manual toothbrush. Its advanced Sonicare technology delivers a thorough, gentle clean in the dentist-recommended 2 minutes, guided by built-in pacing and pressure control features.

Key features:
- Sonicare technology: Powerful sonic vibrations drive fluid between teeth and along the gumline for an effective, gentle clean.
- 2-minute SmarTimer: Ensures you brush for the optimal dentist-recommended duration.
- QuadPacer: Times each quadrant so you spend equal time in all areas of your mouth.
- Pressure Sensor: Flashes red to alert you when brushing too hard, helping prevent gum recession.
- 2 intensity settings: Customize your clean with two levels to match your comfort.
- Slim, ergonomic design: Lightweight handle with a familiar-shaped brush head for easy, comfortable control.
- Cleaning performance: Up to 3x more plaque removal vs. a manual toothbrush; achieve a clean that feels like a month of manual brushing in just 2 minutes.

What’s in the box:
- Philips Sonicare 4100 Rechargeable Electric Toothbrush handle (HX3681/24)
- 1 SimplyClean (C1) brush head
- 1 USB charger (wall adaptor not included)

Color: Black
Type: Rechargeable Electric Toothbrush

Ideal for:
- Daily plaque removal and gum care
- Users transitioning from manual to electric
- Those who want smart timing, pressure feedback, and a minimalist, travel-friendly design.
